TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CacheItemRemovedCallback(string key, object value, CacheItemRemovedReason reason);
.class public auto ansi sealed CacheItemRemovedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CacheItemRemovedCallback(key As String, value As Object, reason As CacheItemRemovedReason)
public delegate void CacheItemRemovedCallback(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, CacheItemRemovedReason reason);
type CacheItemRemovedCallback = delegate of string * obj * CacheItemRemovedReason -> unit

span.span: The key that is removed from the cache.

param.name: value
param.span: 与从缓存中移除的键关联的 项。

span.span: The item associated with the key removed from the cache.

param.name: reason
param.span: 枚举指定的、从缓存移除项的原因。

span.span: The reason the item was removed from the cache, as specified by the enumeration.

summary.span: 定义在从 移除缓存项时通知应用程序的回调方法。

span.span: Defines a callback method for notifying applications when a cached item is removed from the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何向用户显示分配给在缓存中的项的值的页面，并从缓存移除项时通知他们。The following code example demonstrates a page that shows users the value assigned to an item in the cache and then notifies them when the item is removed from the cache. 它会创建`RemovedCallback`方法，它使用的签名委托，以通知用户，如果缓存项被删除，并且使用枚举告诉用户移除的原因。It creates a `RemovedCallback` method, which uses the signature of the delegate, to notify users when the cache item is removed and uses the enumeration to tell them why it was removed. 此外，它使用属性向缓存添加对象和检索这些对象的值。In addition, it uses the property to add objects to the cache and retrieve the value of those objects. 在中`AddItemToCache`方法，它将使用方法将项添加到缓存。In the `AddItemToCache` method, it uses the method to add an item to the cache. 若要使用委派，您必须使用此方法将项添加到缓存或方法，使 ASP.NET 可以自动使适当的方法调用时删除该项。To use the delegate, you must add an item to the cache with this method or the method so that that ASP.NET can automatically make the proper method calls when the item is removed. 自定义`RemoveItemFromCache`方法使用方法以显式从缓存中删除项导致`RemovedCallback`要调用的方法。The custom `RemoveItemFromCache` method uses the method to explicitly delete the item from the cache, causing the `RemovedCallback` method to be invoked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#1)]
